name: Rick's Train
description:
RICK'S   TRAIN

 a game made for 'Black and White Jam #8'

CONTROLS

arrow keys : for walk and jump

c : dash

z : interact with object

x : use the object

escape : open the title menu

!! press 'r button' if you have any glitches or failed at the level!!

TEAM WORKED FOR THE GAME •Coder: me / discord: Laffelious#3483 •Pixel Artist: maxchill#2935 stalinsorders#4071 •SFX Editor: SpaghettDoggo#3190 ***OUR DISCORD SERVER*** https://discord.gg/BfkFAJGE6n

PS: 

All the sounds and visuals in the game were prepared by our team and no assets were used.
